sections.heading: This Act shall be known and may be cited as the "Tobacco Accessories
Purpose. The sale and possession of marijuana, hashish, cocaine,
sections.text:
opium and their derivatives, is not only prohibited by Illinois Law, but
the use of these substances has been deemed injurious to the health of the user.

sections.text:
